content: the between seasons hat pattern is available in 10-sizes this hat is crocheted from the top-down in rounds in one piece this project is part of the september hat of the month cal the adult medium hat used 1 5 oz 44 g and 96 yds 88 m the matching scarf pattern is available here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/between-seasons-scarf-pattern/ direct link to pattern https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/between-seasons-hat-pattern/ this pattern will be available as a free pdf download until september 26 2022 at 11 59 pm et for cal participants simply add the pattern to your cart before 11 59 pm est on september 26th and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on september 25 2022 at 7 00 pm est this pattern is available for free on my blog which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confi facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
